sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not distributive over complement.
message_1: Let set A = {1, 2, 3} and set B = {4, 5}. Find the Cartesian product of A and B, then find the complement of the Cartesian product. Next, find the Cartesian product of the complements of A and B. Finally, determine whether the Cartesian product is distributive over complement or not.
